Room.Name: Hallway in the Boar's Arse
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an upstairs hallway in the Boar's Arse Pub.
Room.LongDescription: There is a only one large room at the end of the hall. Looks like a meeting place of some kind. There is a small crowd, and a speaker is at the front of the room. You see a red banner on the wall, with a white circle on it. An upraised fist, with a single finger erect, is inside the circle.
